scenario_text.value: There’s something in the water here.
Huh? Where? I don’t see anything.

Hmm, maybe it’s tough for humans to see it.
I get the feeling it’s something important.

(Humans can’t see it... Oh, I know. I’ll try
looking with my camera.)

I don’t know if it’s related to Shuuji,
but there’s something in the water.
